title: Twisted Vengeance
description: A Ghost Story to the Core - A Supernatural Thriller That Will Keep You Guessing.... From the #1 Bestselling Author of Reunion and Creepy.Rick Burns is thrust into a supernatural whirlwind while investigating several unsolved murders. In the process, a ghostly boy who may know the killer, takes Rick on a haunting chase through the streets of Indianapolis. What Rick discovers is a maniac bent on vengeance that is unbelievably sick and twisted. The detective has his past and love interest to deal with, but he'll need to solve the case and free his demons before he is the next victim.
author: Jeff Bennington
